description: There must be a bug somewhere. I'm getting the "Update to version 5.25.4 (3.22)" once every 24h, no matter if I update it or I skip it.
Your game life is ever closer to you with the mobile

The Breeze theme (and its GTK integration) looks beautiful, slick and smooth. 
I appreciate all the hard work on it. Especially the dark theme is brilliant, it reduces eye strain. 

One small note however: on a KDE neon install on a Dell Optiplex 790, during updates, when Breeze modifies grub to apply breeze theme in grub: I get hard lock-ups on boot, grub displays but freezes, and keyboard is then not working, only way to recover is booting via a usb stick, mounting the root and boot partition, and removing grub theme from grub config. I wonder if other people also got affected by this?
summary: Looks brilliant especially dark mode, but watch out for breeze on GRUB
